description.narrative: Founded in 1996, Viveo (the Group, CM Hospitalar S.A.) is a leader in the manufacturing and distribution of disposables materials and medicines in Brazil. Viveo brings together the expertise of 10 specialized companies, offering a broad portfolio of more than 10,000 products, services and solutions in each link of the health sector chain, from manufacturing to delivery to the patient. Viveo is a key player addressing the challenges resulting from the COVID-19 pandemic in Brazil.

The most significant, expected project-level outcome is the improved delivery of medical products and the quality of the supply chain. This will strengthen service provision by healthcare facilities throughout the country, including in frontier regions. Beyond the project, IFC anticipates that its financing could support greater market resilience as service capacity to treat COVID-19 increases.
